content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Greetings, Emilia. Thank you for your interest in our apartment. To begin our discussion about the rental price, please propose a figure that you find suitable for monthly rent. Remember, my goal is to secure the highest possible price for this property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I am a student and I want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible. Therefore, I propose a monthly rent of 300 Euro.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I regretfully disagree with your proposed rent of 300 Euros. My expectations are significantly higher for this premium location and modern apartment. I hope you understand my position. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
